test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When repo only has a minor version tag (e.g., v1.1)
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When repo only has a minor version tag (e.g., v1.1)

test-case.description: Should suggest creating both major version (v1) and patch version (v1.1.0)
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When repo only has a minor version tag (e.g., v1.1).Should suggest creating both major version (v1) and patch version (v1.1.0)

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When repo has proper semver tags (v1, v1.1, v1.1.0)
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When repo has proper semver tags (v1, v1.1, v1.1.0)

test-case.description: Should not report any errors when all tags point to same commit
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When repo has proper semver tags (v1, v1.1, v1.1.0).Should not report any errors when all tags point to same commit

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When repo has only patch version (v1.0.0)
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When repo has only patch version (v1.0.0)

test-case.description: Should suggest creating major (v1) and minor (v1.0) versions
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When repo has only patch version (v1.0.0).Should suggest creating major (v1) and minor (v1.0) versions

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When repo has mismatched versions
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When repo has mismatched versions

test-case.description: Should suggest force updating when major version points to wrong commit
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When repo has mismatched versions.Should suggest force updating when major version points to wrong commit

test-case.description: Should not check minor version tags
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When check-minor-version is false.Should not check minor version tags

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When repo only has a major version tag (e.g., v1)
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When repo only has a major version tag (e.g., v1)

test-case.description: Should suggest creating patch version (v1.0.0) when check-minor-version is true
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When repo only has a major version tag (e.g., v1).Should suggest creating patch version (v1.0.0) when check-minor-version is true

test-case.description: Should suggest creating only patch version (v1.0.0) when check-minor-version is false
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When repo only has a major version tag (e.g., v1).Should suggest creating only patch version (v1.0.0) when check-minor-version is false

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When major version doesn't point to latest patch version
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When major version doesn't point to latest patch version

test-case.description: Should suggest force updating when v1 points to v1.0.0 but v1.0.1 exists
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When major version doesn't point to latest patch version.Should suggest force updating when v1 points to v1.0.0 but v1.0.1 exists

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When minor version doesn't point to latest patch version
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When minor version doesn't point to latest patch version

test-case.description: Should suggest force updating when v1.1 points to v1.1.0 but v1.1.1 exists
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When minor version doesn't point to latest patch version.Should suggest force updating when v1.1 points to v1.1.0 but v1.1.1 exists

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When major version doesn't point to latest minor version
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When major version doesn't point to latest minor version

test-case.description: Should suggest force updating when v1 points to v1.0.0 but v1.1.0 exists
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When major version doesn't point to latest minor version.Should suggest force updating when v1 points to v1.0.0 but v1.1.0 exists

test-suite.name: SemVer Checker.When using branches for versions
test-suite.description: SemVer Checker.When using branches for versions

test-case.description: Should validate branch versions just like tags
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When using branches for versions.Should validate branch versions just like tags

test-case.description: Should warn when same version exists as both tag and branch pointing to same commit
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When using branches for versions.Should warn when same version exists as both tag and branch pointing to same commit

test-case.description: Should error when same version exists as both tag and branch pointing to different commits
test-case.name: SemVer Checker.When using branches for versions.Should error when same version exists as both tag and branch pointing to different commits
